text: 🚨🇺🇦 Ukrainian troops are fighting fiercely against Russian forces in eastern Ukraine! 💪🏽🇷🇺Russian troops are making significant gains in the region, including the capture of Bohdanivka. 😱 But Ukraine's commander-in-chief, Oleksandr Syrskyi, says Ukrainian forces are putting up a strong fight! 💪🏽It's a tough battle, but we must support Ukraine in their struggle against Russian aggression! 💕🇺🇦
